# Some notes on concept mapping  {#concept-mapping

There are two mechanisms used in this course to help your
understanding of the topics at hand: _learning journals_ and _concept
maps_. Both of these mechanisms foster reflexivity, a necessary
characteristic of those who aspire to be qualitative researchers.

This chapter explores concept mapping, with a view of providing enough
background so that you can successful 'do' concept mapping.
